nodes.text: Kallidah was a world located in the Kallidah system that was the homeworld of the Kallidahin species and home to the Archaeological Research Council.

Kallidah was first mentioned in Star Wars: Complete Locations, a 2005 Star Wars Legends reference book that compiled Inside the Worlds of Star Wars: Episode I, Inside the Worlds of Star Wars: Attack of the Clones, and Inside the Worlds of Star Wars Trilogy, and included new content written by Kerrie Dougherty that covered locations from Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith. It became canon when it was mentioned in Ultimate Star Wars, a reference book co written by Patricia Barr, Adam Bray, Daniel Wallace, and Ryder Windham that was released in 2015.
